cells.data:
All numbers are divisible by 1 and itself. To check for prime numbers we have to make sure a number has no other divisors. To do this we:

- Loop through all numbers from 2 up until the number itself (half the number, actually, i <= n/2)
- Check to see if each number is divisible (the remainder is 0; n % i === 0)
- If a number is divisible, stop the loop and return `false`.
- If no numbers are divisible, then return `true`
